__e: And here's the guy that started it all.
Yet he's good that did the like for Fleance.
If you ever want anything done, always ask the busy man. The others never have time.
HE who doesn't exist set it on fire.
That's why they called him unkillable.
What's he that was not born of woman?
I now know what it is to live for and with what I love best on earth.
The Lord has said "He that believeth on me believeth not on me... but on him that sent me."
You know, for a woman, there's nothing better than having a child with someone you love.
